summary:
This mod is inspired in the Lotr Fantasy World and brings
to Skyrim a Horn inspired in the Horn of Gondor that 
Boromir had.
descriptionHtml:
This Horn is equipable and adds to the player severall 
constant effects that improve is skills:

Horn of Gondor Enchantment:

Fortify One Handed 5%
Fortify Two Handed 5%
Fortify Marksman 5%
Fortify Health 5%
Fortify Stamina 5%

The horn equips has a Amulet but doesn\'t show in your 
characters body and you still can equip an amulet.


I\'ve also added a cool feature when you equip or unequip 
the horn. 

The Horn has to be Crafted and can only be done in the 
Skyforge.

Installation:

Just copy all the files in to your Skyrim Data Folder and
then activate the mod.

I hope you like it and feel free to comment the mod or give
ideas. If you really liked it don\'t forget to endorse.
author: Sergeynest
